title: Boundary check is missing when setting _optimalUtilizationRate in the constructor
content:
## Severity: Low Risk

## Context
BasePiReserveRateStrategy.sol#L98

## Description
This check is missing in the context:

```solidity
if (optimalUtilizationRate >= uint256(RAY)) {
    revert(Errors.IR_U0_GREATER_THAN_RAY);
}
```

It is best to use internal setter functions that refactor all the necessary logic.

## Recommendation
Instead of setting the storage parameter manually, call `define` and use `_setOptimalUtilizationRate(optimalUtilizationRate)` where all the necessary logic is defined in this setter function, including the boundary check and event emission.

## Astera
Fixed in commit 1eb7b435.

## Spearbit
Fix verified.
